title: Millenary Cusco 4D/3N

itinerary.day: Day 01: Travel to Cusco & City Tour.

activities.text: Acclimatization morning. We will visit landmarks such as the Cathedral, Cristo Blanco Viewpoint, Regocijo Square, San Francisco, and more.
Visit to the archaeological sites near the city of Cusco:
Q'enqo: Ceremonial labyrinth with underground galleries.
Tambomachay: Ritual water center and imperial rest site.

itinerary.day: Day 02: Sacred Valley of the Incas.

activities.text: Hotel pick-up. We will begin our tour to the Sacred Valley of the Incas, visiting its best architectural remains.
Pisaq: Impressive Inca construction. We'll see agricultural terraces, the Intihuatana temple, and visit the modern town of Pisaq, inhabited by Inca descendants.
Urubamba: Buffet lunch at one of the best restaurants. Then we will head to the town of:
Ollantaytambo: Visit the fortress with its symmetrical terraces and 15th-century religious and administrative buildings.
Finally, we will visit Chincheros: a beautiful district known for its textiles and cathedral. Then, return to the hotel and overnight stay.

itinerary.day: Day 03: Visit to the World Wonder "Machu Picchu".

activities.text: We will take the bus to the Machu Picchu citadel. The trip takes approximately 30 minutes.
2-hour guided tour of Machu Picchu, visiting landmarks like the Temple of the Three Windows, the Sun Clock, and more. Free time afterwards.
Visit to the Inca Hot Springs for relaxation.
Return by train to Ollantaytambo. Then private transfer to the city of Cusco.
Arrival in Cusco and overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 04: Free Day in Cusco - Flight to Lima.

activities.text: Transfer to the airport and return flight to Lima.
